entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
